Hero.subtitle: Transform your lifestyle
Hero.title: Achieve your goals with personalized training sessions!

Despre.title: ABOUT ME
Despre.p1: My name is Mihaela Bordeianu, I am a personal trainer, nutrition technician, and professional athlete.
Despre.p2: Since childhood, I have been attracted to sports and competition, investing a lot of passion in every sports activity I engaged in, but I also faced many of the common difficulties for a beginner, such as lack of self-confidence and dissatisfaction with my own physical shape. With such a mindset and without solid knowledge, progress was slow to appear.

p3.1: As I delved deeper into this field,
p3.2: I realized that nutrition plays an essential role
p3.3: and I continued to specialize in this direction. I believe that no one can follow a strict diet indefinitely, which is why I teach those I work with to be flexible, to integrate less healthy foods into their diet, and at the same time, to achieve and maintain their long-term goals.

p4.3: , not a short-term compromise, which is why it is essential to find the optimal approach, both in diet and training, for your goals and lifestyle.

sedentary.title: Sedentary
sedentary.text: Spend most of the day sitting, with little or no physical exercise

extraActive.title: Extra active
extraActive.text: Very intense physical exercise daily or physical labor

Specialize.title: Customized Coaching
Specialize.subtitle: Fitness Made Simple, Results Made Possible

subtitle.subtitle: The change you are waiting for

online.1: The meal plan, workout plan, and supplements will be tailored specifically for your goals, needs, and particularities. I will also be available with answers, motivation, and adjustments (when necessary) throughout the entire process, so you don't plateau, everything is clear, and we achieve the best results in the shortest time.
online.4: personalized workout plan, depending on where you want to train (gym/home), your goals, and availability
online.5: exercises come with video materials, where you will see how to perform them correctly
online.6: you will learn various methods to increase intensity: progressive overload, drop set, rest pause, etc.
online.7: we will communicate on WhatsApp for any questions you may have

one-one.1: This is a service for people who want to work directly under my supervision at 18Gym, Pipera.
one-one.3: personalized workout plan, according to your goals and availability
one-one.6: posture correction during sessions to ensure maximum efficiency of the workouts
one-one.7: you will learn various methods to increase intensity: progressive overload, drop set, rest pause, etc.

Cta.title: For more information, feel free to contact me
